thread.title: Elmo Would Be a Better President: Biden Gets Major Heat for EO Sanctioning Israelis in the West Bank
thread.title_full: Elmo Would Be a Better President: Biden Gets Major Heat for EO Sanctioning Israelis in the West Bank

author: Amy Curtis
title: Elmo Would Be a Better President: Biden Gets Major Heat for EO Sanctioning Israelis in the West Bank
text: [Earlier today, we told you about President Biden's intention to sign an executive order](https://twitchy.com/amy-curtis/2024/02/01/biden-eo-west-bank-israelis-n2392442) concerning Israelis in the West Bank, one that would sanction those who 'attacked' Palestinians. He did it, and took to Twitter/X to brag: I signed an Executive Order allowing the U.S. to issue sanctions against those who direct or participate in acts of violence against civilians in the West Bank, including extremist settlers.‚Äî President Biden (@POTUS) Today‚Äôs action seeks to promote security for Israelis and Palestinians alike. [February 1, 2024] It did not go over well for him, like, at all. West Bank cheered while innocent men, women, children, and even infants were kidnapped, tortured, raped, and murdered by Hamas.‚Äî Theüê∞FOO (@PolitiBunny) Jackass. [February 1, 2024] They did. We all saw the video. We would be better off with Elmo as President, you ridiculous laughingstock and utter failure.‚Äî Ultra Grateful Calvin üá∫üá∏üê∂üèí üé∂ (@shoveitjack) Run along now. It's past your bedtime. [February 1, 2024] Elmo at least seems to care about Americans. [February 1, 2024] So stunning. Much brave. Why doesn‚Äôt Joe Biden issue an Executive Order to close and secure the US border?‚Äî Paul A. Szypula üá∫üá∏ (@Bubblebathgirl) How many more times do our civilians and police officers have to fall victim to illegals before he takes action? Enough is enough. Biden needs to shut down the border or shut down the government. [February 1, 2024] His policy seems to be America last. You're really good at ignoring the border issues‚Äî Mark Zuckerberg - Parody (@MarkZuckss) [February 1, 2024] Yes he is. Today's Executive Order is proof that the real battleground is not in the Middle East...‚Äî Joel M. Petlin (@Joelmpetlin) It's in the Midwest, in swing states like Michigan. [pic.twitter.com/tFbkS7tXwv] [February 1, 2024] Oh, look. [Another political stunt](https://twitchy.com/amy-curtis/2024/01/31/biden-going-to-east-palestine-ohio-n2392395) in an election year. They're all laughing at you.‚Äî ùìêùìµùìµùìÆùì∑ ùì°ùì™ùîÇ (@2CynicAl65) You know that....right? [https://t.co/PgRdVDTzsp] [February 1, 2024] He doesn't know what day it is. So no, he doesn't. All four of them.‚Äî John The Main Guy - Am Yisrael Chai (@JohnTheMainGuy1) No, I'm not making that up. Four. [https://t.co/YTmr9mEoDJ] [February 1, 2024] An executive order targeting four people. And Biden will go brag about it in Michigan and all over the campaign trail. "The sanctions target David Chai Chasdai, Einan Tanjil and Yinon Levi, who are accused of assaulting and intimidating Palestinians. They also target Shalom Zickerman, who is accused of assaulting Israeli activists.‚Äî (James P.S.) Steve Martin (@submx8ch) ...will freeze the...assets in the US...restrict...dealings" [https://t.co/H5RoQp21iX] [February 1, 2024] That'll teach them. This guy protects illegal immigrants on the US and decides to meddle in another country‚Äôs legal system‚Äî Richard Intruder (@RichardIntruder) [https://t.co/DNEZJHMdnH] [February 1, 2024] If another country was doing this, the US would scold them. Lol. Sanctions?‚Äî Sandra Gibeault (@sgeb0) Hey what about east Palestine Ohio? Where is the relief for those residents? [https://t.co/He6zFNaCVP] [February 1, 2024] [He's working on that. For a year](https://twitchy.com/dougp/2024/01/31/hey-look-where-bidens-finally-going-n2392381). And, no, the criticism isn't coming solely from the right: It's election season which is why you're throwing crumbs. Everyone sees through your b.s. in allowing Israel to commit heinous genocide against innocent Palestinians‚Äî Atif (@atif_chavez) [https://t.co/pRT2jYAsko] [February 1, 2024] Crumbs, indeed. Dont just sanction those four. Sanction the entire nation of Israel for its apartheid, genocide, dispossession, oppression, mutilation, humilation, & slaughter of innocent Palestinians. It is not a democracy. It's a theocracy that abuses half of its population. This is a fig leaf‚Äî John in Richmond (@John_B_RIC) [https://t.co/Ww5NKybkZh] [February 1, 2024] Whatever you say, dude. We saw what happened on 10/7. Israel wasn't doing a thing to anyone until Hamas committed an act of terror. Actos of violence against civilians in Gaza is fine though.‚Äî Obi-Wan Kenboaby (@BaylanSkolLager) In fact Joe will sell you the bullets, did I say sell...I meant give at the expense of the US taxpayer [https://t.co/Hl3yAKYucx] [February 1, 2024] He can't win. And you know what? We're okay with this. What about illegals that use acts of violence against us civilians in our own country?‚Äî Robbie Perry (@robertperrysr) I hope those illegals find you. [https://t.co/pGAvSgVNsP] [February 1, 2024] They're welcome with open arms. But if you commit acts of violence against citizens in Chicago or New York‚Ä¶ crickets‚Äî Allen Haberberg (@gabbynoonyraffy) [https://t.co/sXWXp7qYgj] [February 1, 2024] We guess they don't matter. Sadly.
